name: Support by Sony: Find support
description: - Find support information for your Sony products with Support by Sony Support by Sony helps you quickly find support information.  - Instant notification about your bookmarked products Receive important news, software / firmware updates and helpful guides about your products directly to your smartphone.  - Touch your smartphone to your Sony product that supports NFC* and display support information in a flash. *See NFC compatible Sony products on our official site.
